Counter-Strike GO is a first person shooter where skill is needed. Putting in a lot of hours and training will get you to the top. It is a fun game but also has a lot of toxic players. I don't bother myself with them. Don't let them get in your head. Overall it is a fun game for me and i will keep playing it.
